## Checklist

### General
- [ ] Code follows the style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Documentation updated

### For New Agents
- [ ] README.md included
- [ ] SECURITY.md included
- [ ] Required endpoints implemented (`/status`, `/agent-info`, main endpoint)
- [ ] Token validation implemented
- [ ] Scope enforcement implemented
- [ ] No raw data logging
- [ ] `.gitignore` excludes `keys/` and `.env`

### Security
- [ ] No secrets committed
- [ ] No raw user data in logs
- [ ] Token expiration checked
- [ ] Scope permissions enforced
